metadata.description: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from President Sergio Osmeña appointing the former as Chairman of the Board of Inquiry to investigate charges of disloyalty to the Commonwealth of the Philippines and the United States in the province of Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; President Sergio Osmeña; Military; official papers; letter
metadata.title: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from President Sergio Osmeña appointing the former as Chairman of the Board of Inquiry to investigate charges of disloyalty to the Commonwealth of the Philippines and the United States in the province of Leyte
